snippet: With the purse estimated to be roughly $300 million, Mayweather stretched his record to 48-0 while quieting critics who thought he had spent years avoiding a showdown with Pacquiao.
abstract: Floyd Mayweather Jr defeats Manny Pacquiao by unanimous decision, stretching his record to 48-0 and quieting critics who believed he had been avoiding showdown with Pacquiao for years.

byline.contributor: Floyd Whaley contributed reporting from San Antonio, Philippines.

lead_paragraph: With the purse estimated to be roughly $300 million, Mayweather stretched his record to 48-0 while quieting critics who thought he had spent years avoiding a showdown with Pacquiao.

headline.main: Floyd Mayweather Jr. Defeats Manny Pacquiao in Boxing’s Big Matchup
headline.print_headline: Mayweather Stays Perfect With Decision Over Pacquiao
